src:
Donald Trump calls Beto O'Rourke a 'poor bastard' - video
02 Nov 2019, 15:38 by AP



Donald Trump has mocked Beto O'Rourke after the former Texas congressman ended his Democratic presidential campaign. The US president said O'Rourke 'came out of Texas a very hot political property, and he went back as cold as you can be'


Beto O'Rourke withdraws from Democratic race to face Trump
